subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The team’s star shortstop has been with the organization since 1999. Now he’s testing the free-agent market for the first time, and the team seems content to let others set the market.
snippet: The team’s star shortstop has been with the organization since 1999. Now he’s testing the free-agent market for the first time, and the team seems content to let others set the market.
